serverSide.entities

Class BarClientProxy

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • serverSide.entities.BarClientProxy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    StudentCloning, WaiterCloning, java.lang.Runnable

    public class BarClientProxy
extends java.lang.Thread
implements WaiterCloning, StudentCloning
    Service provider agent for access to the Bar. Implementation of a client-server model of type 2 (server replication). Communication is based on a communication channel under the TCP protocol.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class java.lang.Thread
